T02D2489:232a-1: badzra satva s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D2489:232a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2489:232a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2489:232a-5: thog mar bdag nyid stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2489:232a-6: skyil mo krung gis gnas la /
T02D2489:232a-7: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral te /
T02D2489:232a-8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa la dgod
T02D2489:232a-9: par bya'o zhes pa'i sems bskyed pa sngon du song
T02D2489:232a-10: ba'i rjes la / de nas rang tha mal par
T02D2489:232a-11: gnas pa'i spyi bo'i steng du pom las padma dkar
T02D2489:232a-12: ba'i rjes la / po // de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba /
T02D2489:232a-13: de'i steng du h'um dkar po yongs su gyur pa
T02D2489:232a-14: las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po
T02D2489:232a-16: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2489:232a-17: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2489:232a-18: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes pa /
T02D2489:232a-19: phyag g-yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D2489:232a-20: g-yon pas dril bu rked par 'dzin pa /
T02D2489:232a-22: zhabs g-yas pa cung zad brkyang ba'i mtheb chen gyis bdag gis tshangs bug la reg par bsams la /
T02D2489:232a-23: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du h'um la yi ge brgya bas bskor nas yod par bsams la /
T02D2489:232a-24: de las 'od 'phros pas 'og min na bzhugs pa'i
T02D2489:232a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas bdud rtsi'i chu
T02D2489:232a-26: rgyun 'o ma lta bu drangs nas /
T02D2489:232a-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar zhugs nas zhabs kyi
T02D2489:232a-28: mtheb chen gyi sna brtol nas bdag gi tshangs pa'i
T02D2489:232a-29: bu gnas zhugs pas lus thams cad 'chi med kyi
T02D2489:232a-30: bdud rtsis gang bar bsams te /
T02D2489:232a-31: des bdag gis tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas
T02D2489:232a-32: bsags pa'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas
T02D2489:232a-33: pa'i sdig pa thams cad dud khu lta bu rkang
T02D2489:232a-34: mthil nas 'thon par bsams te lus shel dag pa
T02D2489:232a-35: ltar phyi nang sa le bar bsam mo //
T02D2489:232a-36: de nas dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbu bar bya'o //
T02D2489:232a-37: de nas rig sngags brgya po ji lta ba bzhin dag par brjod do //
T02D2489:232a-38: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas rigs
T02D2489:232a-39: kyi bu khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad dag go
T02D2489:232a-40: zhes gsung bar bsams la de nyid du thi ma
T02D2489:232b-0: par bsam mo // bdag nyid nus @232b ldan kun gyi mchog tu gyur par shes par bya'o //
T02D2489:232b-1: lam thams cad kyi dag byed kyi thabs dpal rdo
T02D2489:232b-2: rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya ba'i sgrub thabs bla
T02D2489:232b-3: ma mngon shes can rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa
T02D2489:232b-5: / yul dbus kyi dpe ji lta ba bzhin lo
T02D2489:232b-6: ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal
T02D2489:232b-7: bzang pos gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa
